content:
Awesome. I’ll build a focused strategy for Claude DC’s immediate next steps:

I'll create an implementation roadmap that includes:
- Finalization of the Bach-inspired router logic
- Orchestration layer tuning with token optimization
- Integration validation between dashboard, MCP, and routing logic
- Multi-sensory pipeline activation prep (visual/audio pattern feedback)

This will include technical next actions, file locations, environment commands, and startup sequencing. I’ll also list what you can do hands-on right now to move things forward while Claude is paused.

Give me a few moments to get this prepped for you.
